channel.title: Charger Cables on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Charger Cables on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Tech’s Biggest Racket
item.description: Over at the New York Times, John Herrman has given voice to a certain kind of obsolescence that we’ve come to see a lot—that created not by the technology itself, but by the constant forward thrust of technology that has forced a device that technically still has a lot of years left in it into the dumpster. “If my old iPad could talk, it might ask me what has changed,” he wrote.
